entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 8:31 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:31 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Sunny. Low minus 12.
